This Ramadan, let’s explore mosques from around the world. Embodying both, modernity and heritage, the Sheikh Khalifa Bin Zayed Al Nahyan Mosque was founded in Al Ain, UAE. The mosque’s dome is detailed with gold calligraphy that reads verses from the Quran. 

📸 shmoo5z https://t.co/NpJxb3O9zM
